Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO RACING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to thoroughbred equine drug testing standards
Summary: Relates to thoroughbred equine drug testing standards.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to thoroughbred equine drug testing standards
